Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: All rates at this hotel include in-room WiFi high speed Internet access

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Plan a corporate conference in one of our hotel's 22 modern meeting rooms, or attend a business convention at the nearby Ottawa Convention Centre.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Stay fit and healthy here in Ottawa at our Kent Club fitness centre, which boasts an a full gym, an indoor heated pool, and a kids' game room.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Enjoy happy hour specials with seasoned pundits and journalists inside our comfortable street-side restaurant, "Spin" Kitchen & Bar.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Experience a dazzling mix of style and substance at the Ottawa Marriott Hotel, a luxury destination conveniently located here in downtown Ottawa, Ontario.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Discover the charms of Canada's capital city at the Ottawa Marriott Hotel. With a picture-perfect location right in the heart of vibrant downtown Ottawa, Ontario, our hotel offers guests a superb location from which to explore the city. Our 480 stylish guest rooms and suites feature stunning floor-to-ceiling windows, luxury bedding, and complimentary high-speed Internet access. Visit our signature restaurant, "Spin" Kitchen & Bar, for comfort food with a modern twist, or grab a coffee and a light bite at our on-site StarbucksÂ® before heading out for the day. Close to historic Parliament Hill and only a short drive away from the scenic Rideau Canal, our hotel offers places the best of Ottawa right at your fingertips. We offer an array of spectacular event spaces, including a stunning revolving venue, The Summit - as well as expert planning and catering services. We look forward to making your visit truly extraordinary here at the Ottawa Marriott Hotel.

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: Experience unparalleled service at our luxury Ottawa hotel

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Located in downtown Ottawa's bustling business district, one block from Canada's Parliament Buildings, a short walk to the Rideau Canal, the Ottawa Convention Centre, the National Gallery of Canada and a 20-minute drive to Ottawa International Airport.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Centrally located in Ottawa, Ontario, our hotel offers a superb location from which to explore.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Relax with superior room amenities like plush, down bedding and luxury THANN bath amenities.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Enjoy modern facilities like complimentary high-speed Internet access and high-tech plug-in panels.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Our hotel rooms' expansive, floor-to-ceiling windows offer stunning views of downtown Ottawa.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Reserve a Concierge Level room for complimentary Continental breakfast and upgraded amenities.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Marriott Rewards members can enjoy the ease and convenience of our mobile app check-in service.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Centrally located in Ottawa, Ontario, our hotel offers a superb location from which to explore.
Relax with superior room amenities like plush, down bedding and luxury THANN bath amenities.
Enjoy modern facilities like complimentary high-speed Internet access and high-tech plug-in panels.
Our hotel rooms' expansive, floor-to-ceiling windows offer stunning views of downtown Ottawa.
Reserve a Concierge Level room for complimentary Continental breakfast and upgraded amenities.
Marriott Rewards members can enjoy the ease and convenience of our mobile app check-in service.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Enjoy the convenience of 35,000 square feet of conference room space in downtown Ottawa.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: We offer 22 meeting room spaces, which can be adapted to meet the needs of your corporate event.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Host 600 guests for a corporate conference in our largest meeting room, the Victoria Ballroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Ideally situated for business travel, our hotel is a short walk from the Ottawa Convention Centre.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Be productive during your visit with the aid of our comprehensive on-site corporate facilities.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Learn more about our "Simply Meetings" program and enjoy the dedicated services of our event staff.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Situated in the heart of downtown Ottawa, our hotel is within walking distance of Parliament Hill.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: We're also near a range of cultural institutions, including the fascinating Canadian War Museum.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Take a visit to the nearby Rideau Canal, an iconic Ottawa landmark and a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Explore our flexible wedding reception packages, which can be customized to fit your event's needs.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: The Summit, our stunning revolving venue space, offers unparalleled city views of downtown Ottawa.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Offering 6,365 square feet of deluxe event space, our Victoria Ballroom can host up to 600 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Take advantage of our experienced on-site culinary team to craft a delectable wedding menu.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Utilize our QuickGroup booking service to reserve ten or more rooms for out-of-town wedding guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Allow our certified event planners to coordinate every detail of your wedding reception in Ottawa.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy superior dining at "Spin" Kitchen & Bar, our signature restaurant and lounge serving casual cuisine in a relaxed environment in downtown Ottawa.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Start your morning in downtown Ottawa with a coffee beverage and grab-and-go breakfast from our convenient lobby StarbucksÂ®.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Follow Airport Parkway north for 8 kilometers. Airport Parkway will become Bronson Avenue. Continue north on Bronson Avenue for 5 kilometers to Queen Street and turn right. The hotel is located three blocks down Queen Street at the corner of Queen and Kent Streets.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: 15 waterslides, including 5 Kiddie slides, leisure pools, waterfalls, picnic facilities and arcade.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Have fun while learning at this hands-on educational zoo with alligators, snakes and more.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Largest collection of Mazes (11) in North America, hayrides, water spray zone, tree forts and more.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Challenge your motor skills, tease your brain, see antique cars and climb aboard steam locomotives.

Description.Name: Directions to Highway from Property
Description.Text: Travel West on Queen St. 2 blocks to Bronson Ave. Follow Bronson Ave. South 2 miles, to Highway access West or East

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: West, follow 417 East to Kent St. exit follow Kent St. North to Queen St. (2miles), East, follow 417 West to Catherine St. West exit follow Catherine St. West to Kent St.(4 traffic lights), turn right and follow Kent St. North to Queen St.(2miles)

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Join us for Ottawaâs Upcoming Summer Festivals!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Visit the International Busker Festival from July 31 â August 4 for incredible street performers around the world! For beer lovers, check out National Capital Craft Beer Week, August 9-17. For a celebration of music, art and dance, visit Folk Fest, Sept 10-14.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: More chairs? More coffee? Too hot? Too cold?

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: With Marriott's Meeting Services App, you can manage your event without ever leaving your seat.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Celebrate winter at Winterlude, home to the continent's largest snow playground!

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: For the ultimate in luxury, try one of our Concierge-level rooms with contemporary dÃ©cor and local artwork, a 37" LCD TV, Wi-Fi access ($), ergonomic chair and swivel desk as well as luxury bedding with down comforters.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: The Ottawa Marriott's fully renovated Kent Club features all new Lifecycle cardio equipment with personal TVs and iPod plug-ins. Stay fit with our treadmills, bikes, rowing machines, strength training machines, as well as an indoor heated pool and sauna.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: We unveiled our reinvented lobby to meet the business traveler's needs. The Marriott Great Room offers functional seating, the latest technology including two iMacs, a printer and free Wi-Fi. Our lobby leads to SPIN Kitchen & Bar with iPads available.

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: In late 2010, SPIN Kitchen & Bar, featuring fresh, wholesome comfort food, opened as part of our new Great Room. With several high-def TVs and free Wi-Fi, we'll keep you updated on the latest political news & sports. SPIN Time daily from 4-7 pm.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: The four-diamond Ottawa Marriott is located in the heart of downtown Ottawa, steps from Parliament Hill, the business district and a 25-minute drive from the Ottawa airport.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Start your day at our Starbucks store, now serving warm breakfast sandwiches. Guests can relax or re-energize after work with a visit to our fitness center with sauna, indoor heated pool and cardio equipment with personal TVs and iPod plug-ins.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: In late 2010, we unveiled our reinvented lobby designed to meet the business traveler's needs. The Marriott Great Room offers stylish seating, the latest technology including two iMacs, a printer and free Wi-Fi as well as the new SPIN Kitchen & Bar.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: For the ultimate in luxury, try a Concierge-level room with modern decor, a 37' LCD TV and luxury bedding with down comforters. Guests also have access to our private lounge with continental breakfast, evening hors d'oeuvres and free business services.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: The Ottawa Marriott Hotel is one of Ottawa's premier hotels, featuring stylish guest rooms, convenient amenities and world-class service. Ideal for corporate meetings and events, the hotel offers over 35,000 square feet of meeting and event space to accommodate any size meeting or event. With 26 flexible meeting rooms and a spacious 6,400 square foot Ballroom, the hotel's professional events team will work to design a meeting or event that meets your needs and budget. This large hotel features 486 guest rooms and suites with luxurious Revive Collection bedding, an ergonomic work desk and chair, Marriott Plug-in panel to stay connected and complimentary high-speed Internet access. The Ottawa Marriott Hotel also offers convenient onsite amenities including "spin" Kitchen & Bar, serving fresh and wholesome comfort food in a comfortable setting. Guests and meeting attendees can also stay in shape at the hotel's state-of-the-art fitness facility or relax in the heated indoor pool and whirlpool. For guests wishing to venture outside of the hotel, there are numerous attractions within walking distance of the hotel including the Parliament buildings, Rideau Canal and Byward Market. A full-service business centre is also onsite for convenience. Consider this upscale Ottawa hotel for your next meeting or event and your expectations will be exceeded.
